storyInfo:
Under the close teamwork and withering firepower of Rhodes Island's forces, the enemy is wiped out before they can react.
However, Patriot appears at a critical moment.

attributes.content: Runner Three, down!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Runner Seven, destroyed!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Runner Eight, intercepted.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Raidian, execute the feint! Use your Arts to extend or hit their nervous systems directly!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Pull all the enemies!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: *Pant* *pant*... so tough. Is everyone okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No problems yet... But... it's really intense. I've never seen combat on this scale before...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm due for a vacation if I make it back from this.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Right. I'll approve it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But first... let's knock out this team! Then if you want a raise, a vacation, a specific assignment, I'll grant anything!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Incoming!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Don't get distracted! Back in formation!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: A major firefight by the east exit? Stay calm, push ahead slow. Don't give them an opening!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: These don't look like Ursus or Yen tactics. What's going on? Who are they?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: After picking off Ursus soldiers for years, now we get ambushed?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: No actual fighting...? Cowards! You'll pay for underestimating the guerrillas!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Watch the altar! The protection the Captain gave us only mitigates its effects. He told us a million times not to go near it unless we have to!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Runner, get the other teams on the horn.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: ...No response?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Where are the mortars? And the devils?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Hold on. Something's not right.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Runner Twelve, destroyed!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The guerrilla fighters are closing ranks! Now's our best chance to break through!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.options: No! It could be a trap!

attributes.content: Roger. Rosmontis, let's scan the area with our Arts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't reach it. The enemy... is blocking me somehow.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Sarkaz casters. They're the only ones who could interfere with Arts like Rosmontis's.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Then it's up to me...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Raidian, how long can you keep it up?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...We'll be quick.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... I found them. Yes. They have a lot of snipers and casters hidden in those buildings.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They're calm... some agitated. But they're not fanatics. They're... fortifying that point.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Duty.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Doctor is right. It's a trap.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm nearby. I'm coming.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Can you do it?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes. I won't smash the whole building. I'll just destroy the level they're on, so they won't bother us.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Amiya, I can do it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Right, Rosmontis... I know you can. Definitely.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Amiya, will you p'ei fu me then?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Err? What?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I heard Blaze say there aren't many people who can make you p'ei fu them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: P'ei fu? Oh... does that mean 'respect?' Sorry, I'm not so good with the Yen language. I'm pretty sure that's what it means?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't know, Amiya...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Doesn't matter. Because I've always 'p'ei fu'd' Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're amazing, really. I couldn't do what you do...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I couldn't bear that loss and loneliness.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's no way I could live with it like you do, suffer through it like you do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're lying.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But it doesn't matter to me. Even if you're a liar, you're still Amiya to me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Someone could... p'ei fu... a person like me?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's like you just said, Rosmontis. You're Rosmontis, so I respect you. As both an elite operator and a friend.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Keep at it, Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Okay. We'll keep at it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Where are they? What are they waiting for?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: N-No! We can't leave the area! We strike as soon as they show their faces! No one else falls out of contact!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Hey, is that an enemy on top of that building over there?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: ...A cat? Just one little Feline...?!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Runner! Tell the casters! The enemy deployed a caster on the building across the way!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: We've gotta take her out!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: —A sword? A weapon? She's pulling them out of the air...
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Huh? Floating weapons?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Slice from here, to there.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hold it... with my hands. Cut, with the sword.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Like slicing a potato.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Like slicing a potato.
Doctor! Get over here!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: The whole building... got cut in half?

attributes.content: Rosmontis is destroying the guerrillas' ambush point. Watch for falling debris!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Assuming you're talking about Rosmontis's Arts, it may be time to explain it to you, now that you've seen it so many times.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is a state of mind she shapes herself. You can think of it like Rosmontis has a gigantic, second, invisible body that cannot be acted upon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is a formless extension of her sense of touch. She can grab, squeeze, lift up, and toss away.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But these Arts lack objective manifestation, as opposed to her subjective mind.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It can act upon us with force, but we cannot act upon it. We only know it exists with the application of special Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You need not grasp it fully. This is not your area of expertise.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis was much more destructive before we put a weapon in her hands. A lot like being crushed beneath the treads of a nomadic city. All that's left is a crying young girl alone in the ruins.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Under no circumstances can that be allowed to happen again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Doctor, move.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I see it. The command group is coming...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There should be a waterway under the ruins of the park fountain.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They hid in such an inconspicuous place.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...The story of the ambush on Graymane Peak, that supposedly involved seven straight days of stakeout and tricked the strongest of knights, may well have been true.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's go, Dr. {@nickname}. No time to lose.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Raidian, cease fire. Find a good place to hide. I need you to focus on keeping our comms up.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mantra-2, log all our conversations. Every last word.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Runner Group Fourteen, successfully intercepted.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Amiya, Dr. Kal'tsit, I'm ready.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: (Are you okay...? Talk to me! Look at me!)
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: (Good, you're with us. I'm okay. Doesn't matter. You hide somewhere, don't let them find you... we need you to regroup.)
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: (I know. We'll get them. You stay quiet!)
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: (I'm fine. No injuries. A little stone is nothing compared to an Ursus Fortcracker.)
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: (Don't panic! I can stop it, you look for an opening!)
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: You! What are you looking at?! Too scared to fight us?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Whoever you are, you lost the guts to take us on now? Too scared of Patriot's blood? Scared of his witchcraft?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Thinking back to the time you fought the Sarkaz? You had them outnumbered, you could've won, but in the end you just ran up the casualties!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: But we'll do you one better! You can't break our shields, you can't crack our armor! You're nothing before the undying Patriot!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: The mightiest Ursus warrior... needs no spear or shield. He'll stomp you to pieces.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: You... are nothing!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Our fighters will regroup here soon! You can't run. Reunion will put you through hell!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Oppressors who enslave the Infected like us! You will be swallowed up by the Reunion movement!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Reunion—
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: ...Reunion already betrayed you, sir.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —Little girl?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: ...Two... Infected little girls?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Out of the way.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: There's a man behind you, and I'm going to break the device behind him.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You think I'll show you mercy just because you look like a kid?
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Don't underestimate Patriot's Guard! We're the Aegis of the Infected... I'm here to stop your attack.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: If you attack the Infected, I'll strangle you with my own two hands!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Then my weapons will talk for me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You... You're the cat from before.
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Your sword...
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: (Get out of here, guardian! Tell the others! I'll be okay!)
attributes.name: Runner

attributes.content: (That's your job, not mine! You have to survive!)
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Come, try to pierce my shield! Try to break my armor!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: Amiya. I'm out of options.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He won't die. But he may never walk again.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Go. Stab...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You, can't.
How... you blocked my sword with your bare hands?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hm... My hand... numb...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: When did you get here? I never felt...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No. Oh... I think... I thought that was a building collapsing, but that was you?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You, no, you and your team... You're like...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...a mountain.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis, fall back.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: That's an order, Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: An order.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Captain...!
attributes.name: Guerrilla Fighter

attributes.content: You did, well. Go, regroup.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Now, you...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don't care, who, you are.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You attacked, my men. You, die.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't care?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Very, sure—
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Wait... wait.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You... how...?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It's been a while.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You... Dame Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Patriot
